abstract: The Cordis Corporation, a subsidiary of Johnson & Johnson, has begun the first attempt by a medical device maker to market a heart stent directly to consumers.
snippet: The Cordis Corporation, a subsidiary of Johnson & Johnson, has begun the first attempt by a medical device maker to market a heart stent directly to consumers.
lead_paragraph: FOOTBALL fans who tuned in to watch the Dallas Cowboys crush the New York Jets on Thanksgiving Day saw at least one novel play: the first attempt by a medical device maker to market a heart stent directly to consumers.

headline.main: A Heart Stent Maker Decides the Way to the Patient Is Through the Patient
headline.print_headline: A Heart Stent Maker Decides the Way to the Patient Is Through the Patient
